band1.name: My Chemical Romance
band1.description: My Chemical Romance is considered one of the greatest alternative rock bands of the 2000s. Formed in Jersey City, New Jersey in 2001.

band2.name: Motionless In White
band2.description: Chris Motionless - Vocals, Ricky Horror - Guitar, Ryan Sitkowski - Guitar, Vinny Mauro - Drums, Justin Morrow - Bass
